nodes.text: The finance ministry was the government department of the Galactic Empire which dealt with financial issues and headquartered in the Federal District of Coruscant, the Imperial throneworld. Lieutenant Thrawn of the Imperial Navy, and his aide Ensign Eli Vanto, discovered that the Empire had made use of much more doonium than they required for starship construction. Thrawn argued that this must be a result of a large, unannounced project which was kept secret even from the Imperial Senate and the finance ministry. He would later find out that this secret project was in fact the Death Star, a moon-sized deep-space mobile battle station with the ability to destroy an entire planet.
The finance ministry of the Galactic Empire was first mentioned in the canon 2017 novel Thrawn, written by Timothy Zahn.
